entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Old Crow Airport 12:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: W 37 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
